Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Ferrera Blanca in Santanyi (Cala d'Or), you'll be convenient to Cala d'Or Marina. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Cala Mondrago Beach and Vall d'Or Golf.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 183 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 4 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including an outdoor tennis court and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the apartment's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the apartment's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cala d'Or Marina - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Cala Mondrago Beach - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Vall d'Or Golf - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Cala Figuera Port - 8 km / 5 mi
Cala Domingo Beach - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Cala Santany Beach - 9.6 km / 5.9 mi
Cala Antena Beach - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Cala Varques - 14.2 km / 8.9 mi
Caves of Drach - 19.1 km / 11.9 mi
Es Trenc Beach - 22.4 km / 13.9 mi
Punta de N'Amer Watch Tower - 26.1 km / 16.2 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi
Maioris Golf Club - 41.7 km / 25.9 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 42.4 km / 26.3 mi
Golf Son Gual - 42.5 km / 26.4 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Ferrera Blanca is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 47.2 km / 29.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
